name: CareOasis
headline: Helping family caregivers get paid through government programs

founders.name: Anuhya Vajapey, Founder
founders.description: Background in ML in Healthcare, strategy at McKinsey, product at F5. Currently building marketplace for care.

founders.name: Juan M Ochoa Ortiz, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CTO at Casehopper. Previously at data science and software roles at Microsoft Bing, and Meta. Background building information extraction systems with language models.

# Get paid for family caregiving
We believe in empowering family caregivers with the resources they need. From personalized support to professional training, and most importantly, compensation, we're here to help you provide the best care possible—all while getting paid.
[Get Started](https://thecareoasis.com/</getstarted/form>)[Learn More](https://thecareoasis.com/</about>)
![Mom and Daughter](https://thecareoasis.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmomanddaughter.e7029719.png&w=2048&q=75)
![Backed By YCombinator](https://thecareoasis.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbackedby.8201e4eb.png&w=384&q=75)
## How It Works
We make it simple for family caregivers to get paid for the care they provide.
  * ![](https://thecareoasis.com/_next/static/media/paperwork.e481af99.svg)
### 1. Check Your Eligibility
Answer a few quick questions about your caregiving role, and we'll help you determine if you qualify for compensation, without any complicated forms.
  * ![](https://thecareoasis.com/_next/static/media/certification.1d966e05.svg)
### 2. Get Enrolled and Certified
We'll guide you through certification and enrollment in your state's program. Our team handles the details, so you can focus on caregiving.
  * ![](https://thecareoasis.com/_next/static/media/paycheck.a7cab1c8.svg)
### 3. Get Paid
Begin receiving regular paychecks for the care you provide. We offer ongoing support and resources to help you continue delivering high-quality care to your loved ones.


## Frequently asked questions
Is this program free?
Do I need to be enrolled in Medicaid?
What states is this available in?
## Footer
### CareOasis

generated_description:
**CareOasis: A Brief Overview**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's S23 batch, CareOasis is a forward-thinking startup based in Dover, Delaware, focused on a crucial issue: compensating family caregivers through government programs. With just a team of two, CareOasis is already making waves in the fintech and healthcare sectors.

### Mission

CareOasis is all about empowering family caregivers. Their goal is straightforward—help these everyday heroes get paid for the vital care they provide to their loved ones. They offer resources, support, and training to make the caregiving journey a little easier, all while ensuring caregivers receive the compensation they deserve.

### How It Works

CareOasis simplifies the process for family caregivers looking to get compensated. Here’s the step-by-step breakdown:

1. **Check Your Eligibility**: Caregivers start by answering a few quick questions to see if they qualify for compensation—no complicated paperwork involved.

2. **Enroll and Get Certified**: Once deemed eligible, CareOasis guides caregivers through the certification process for their state’s compensation program, handling all the details so caregivers can focus on what truly matters: providing care.

3. **Get Paid**: After completing the necessary steps, caregivers can begin receiving regular paychecks. Plus, the ongoing support from CareOasis means caregivers have resources to enhance the quality of care they provide.

### Team and Leadership

Currently, CareOasis operates with a small but impactful team of two, bringing fresh perspectives and dedication to a growing challenge in family caregiving. They’re supported by Tom Blomfield as a Group Partner, who brings valuable insights from his extensive experience in the tech space.

### Why It Matters

CareOasis is tapping into a growing need in society as the population ages and more families find themselves stepping into caregiving roles. By facilitating compensation for caregivers, they not only alleviate some financial stress but also validate the important work that family caregivers do every day.

### Conclusion

If you’re interested in exploring caregiver compensation or want to learn more about how CareOasis can support you or your loved ones, check out their website at [CareOasis](https://thecareoasis.com). In a world where caregiving is often an unsung effort, CareOasis is striving to bring it into the light—and profit.

It's a small team with a big vision, and they are definitely one to watch as they grow and evolve in the healthcare landscape.
